meanings.definition: The act of taking part in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: Her participation in the school play brought joy to her family.
meanings.sent2: The team's success was due to everyone's participation in the game.
meanings.sent3: His participation in the dance competition surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The community's participation in the charity event was heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The children's participation in the science fair was impressive.
